title: Feed Page & Post Creation
problem: The feed is the core of SocialHub where users consume and create content. Without a functional feed, users cannot engage with the platform's primary purpose.
success_metrics: Users can create posts with text content
Feed displays posts in chronological order
Infinite scroll loads more posts as user scrolls
Post cards display author, content, timestamp, and engagement stats
Create post form has character count and validation
Skeleton loading provides smooth experience during data fetch

items.title: Post Model & Service
items.description: Define the Post data model and create a PostService for CRUD operations with mock data.
acceptance_criteria: Post interface with fields: id, author, content, createdAt, likesCount, commentsCount, sharesCount, images
Author interface with fields: id, name, username, avatar
PostService with methods: getFeedPosts, getUserPosts, createPost, getPostById

items.title: Post Card Component
items.description: Create the post card component that displays individual posts with author info, content, timestamp, and engagement preview.
acceptance_criteria: Author avatar and name link to profile
Post content with clickable hashtags and mentions

items.title: Create Post Component
items.description: Build the create post form with text input, character count, and submit functionality.
acceptance_criteria: Textarea with placeholder 'What's on your mind?'
Submit button (disabled when empty or over limit)

items.title: Feed Page Layout
items.description: Create the main feed page layout with create post section, posts list, and infinite scroll.
acceptance_criteria: Create post component at top of feed
Loading spinner at bottom during fetch

items.title: Infinite Scroll Implementation
items.description: Implement infinite scroll for the feed to load posts progressively as user scrolls.
acceptance_criteria: Load more posts when nearing bottom
Handle end of feed (no more posts)
